derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (denoting a statement calling attention to something): from Old French advertissement, from the verb advertir (see advertise)

encyclopedia.content: 发音 advertisement 英音：[əd'və:tismənt] 美音：[ædvə'taizmənt]词典解释 名词 n. 1. 广告，宣传[U] eg: Advertisement helps to sell goods. 广告有助于推销商品。 2. 锛堃辉蝻級广告，公告，启事[C] 简写：ad[aed]用法示例 The wall was covered with advertisements. 墙上贴满了广告。 It has many advertisementsand many different sections. 星

entry.def: An advertisement is an announcement in a newspaper, on television, or on a poster about something such as a product, event, or job.

example.ex: Miss Parrish recently placed an advertisement in the local newspaper.
example.tran: 帕里什小姐最近在本埠报纸上登了一则广告。

entry.def: If you say that an example of something is an advertisement for that thing in general, you mean that it shows how good that thing is.

example.ex: The England team were a poor advertisement for European football tonight...
example.tran: 英格兰队今晚为欧洲足球做了一次糟糕的宣传。

example.ex: That would not be a good advertisement for Hungary's emerging democracy.
example.tran: 那并不能有效地体现匈牙利新兴的民主意识。

means.word_mean: 1. a public promotion of some product or service

stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+converted[adj.更换信仰的, 修改的]→adj.不改的, 不变化的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的
stems_affixes.word_buile: controvert[v.反驳,驳斥]+ible可..的→adj.可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 更换信仰的, 修改的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convert[v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]]+ed……的→adj.更换信仰的, 修改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可改变的, 自由兑换的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convert[v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]]+ible可..的→adj.可改变的, 自由兑换的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+controvertible[adj.可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的]→adj.无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能兑换的,不能变换的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+convertible[adj.可改变的, 自由兑换的]→adj.不能兑换的,不能变换的
advertise[v.公告,公布;为……做广告 v.登广告]+ment表名词→n.广告;公告;登广告
revers=revert[v.回复到,重议]+ion表名词→n.返回[原状,旧习惯],逆转
ad加强[有"向"之意]+vert转+ise表动词→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……

stems_affixes.value_cn: 防止,避免 ;转移[目光,注意力等]
变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]
stems_affixes.word_buile: con+vert转→v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使转向,使改道;转移[注意力];使娱乐

sentences.en: If you want to sell your old sofa, why not put an advertisement in the local newspaper?
sentences.cn: 如果你想卖掉旧沙发, 何不在本地报纸上登个广告呢?

sentences.en: He glanced his eyes down the classified advertisements.

jushi.english: If you want to sell your house property, why not put an advertisement in the newspaper?
jushi.chinese: 如果你想卖掉你的房产,何不在报纸上登个广告呢?

jushi.english: He glanced his eyes down the classified advertisements.
The newspaper usually carries several pages of advertisement.
jushi.chinese: 这家报纸通常登载数版广告。
